website_summaries.verdict: An attractive model that has lots of user-friendly features but falls a bit short when it comes to durability.
pros: Features attractive silver-plated handrail and serving shelf
Has similar features to other models – three switch options, warmer, and storage bin
cons: It's challenging to assemble and doesn't feel as sturdy as some other popcorn machines

customer_reviews.title: Great machine. Very easy to assembly and to clean
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Very easy to assembly and to clean. Has a nice storage compartment behind door to store oil and popcorn. The popcorn popper pot is very easy to remove to clean and the bottom tray that slides out is convenient for picking up loose kernels that don't pop. The bottom tray is easy to remove for cleaning you just need to take off the little front flipper door on the front. The popcorn popper works great and can be removed from cart to be a counter top model if needed. Construction is built good and the wheels are durable.
customer_reviews.author: Woodcrafter0621

customer_reviews.title: Love the machine but worried about cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This popcorn machine is very pretty and relatively easy to assemble. I have used it twice and am not sure if I have to take the popcorn receptacle with spinner out every time I need to clean it. It is awkward to try to do this while it is still attached inside the machine. This is definitely NOT a deal breaker because the machine is so cool looking and makes great popcorn fast! I would recommend this machine.

customer_reviews.title: Great popcorn maker, good looking, solid design

Now I use one cup popcorn, half cup oil, half a teaspoon popcorn salt. Now the popcorn is excellent!! (probably not healthy though)

product_meta.title: Maxi-Matic EPM-200 Popcorn Popper Machine, Red
product_meta.description: Color:RedFamily and friends can enjoy traditional hot oil kettle popcorn with Elite's classic style tabletop popcorn popper. Features include a 8-ounce stainless steel kettle with built in stirring system, plexiglass windows and door, bottom warmer, and warming light to keep popcorn hot. Popcorn Popper has electroplated stainless steel handles and wheels. Easy to clean detachable stainless steel 8-ounce popping kettle. Makes up to 3-1/2-gallon of popcorn per batch. Includes all stainless steel accessories: detachable 8-ounce kettle, salt shaker, popcorn scoop, measuring cup and spoon.
feature_bullets: Makes freshly popped buttered popcorn - Up to 3 gallons of popcorn per batch with 3 switches-Light-Heat-Motor
Easy to clean detachable stainless steel 8-ounce popping kettle
Silver electroplated handrail and serving platform, 18-inch silver anodized wheels, and stands at 5-feet tall
Features a bottom warmer to keep popcorn fresh and warm
Tempered glass windows and plexiglass door, kernel crumb tray, and popcorn supply storage cabinet
